response.original_title: Bob Harper: Total Body Transformation 1 - Complete Body Power Transformation
response.overview: Soar miles above your fitness plateau with two limit-defying, threshold-shattering workouts that annihilate fat and replace it with lean, solid, power-packed muscle.  Are you ready to take your body to the ultimate level?  60 minutes of innovative, high-level training incorporating intervals, plyometrics, strength, and endurance.  Fire-up your metabolic engine, activate fast twitch muscle fibers, and engage your entire body for extreme calorie burn and lean muscle gain.
response.tagline: If you want to transform your body, you have to revolutionize the way you exercise
response.title: Bob Harper: Total Body Transformation 1 - Complete Body Power Transformation
